commenter_a: I think this is a positive thing, but most people I've talked to that oppose that bathroom scenario is not from the perspective of the transgender, but from what harm could come from people abusing that system to gain access to bathrooms they wouldn't normally have access to. If there was a way to guarantee kids and women's and men's safety in the bathrooms, then I don't think people would mind..regardless, we should be teaching both genders to not be dick holes to other people, regardless of what bathroom they most identify with.
